name: WZYUnlimitedScrollView
summary: WZYUnlimitedScrollView is a high degree of customization running on the iOS side of the automatic  banner.
description: WZYUnlimitedScrollView is a high degree of customization running on the iOS side of the automatic  banner. Support for local images and web images.You can listen to the picture click and rotate the pull-down drag pull zoom. Lightweight, easy integration.
